snp5.1:16.4: Jinānaṃ hettha → jinānaṃ hettha (bj) | jinānaṃ heta (si) | jinānaṃ heta (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp5.1:17.2: pathavimaṇḍale → puthuvi maṇḍale (bj) | puthavimaṇḍale (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | paṭhavimaṇḍale (sya-all)
snp5.1:22.5: gantvāna passemu → gantvā namassemu (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp5.1:27.3: Dvattiṃsāni ca → dvattiṃsā ca (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | dvattiṃsa tāni (?)
snp5.1:38.2: Purimāhissatiṃ → purimaṃ māhissatiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | puraṃ māhissatiṃ (sya-all)
snp5.1:43.2: Sataraṃsiṃva → vītaraṃsiṃva (si, sya-all) | vītaraṃsiva (pts-vp-pli1ed) | sataraṃsīva (mr) | pītaraṃsiṃva (^cnd1#42 [Vatthugāthā])
